00032 TableInfo::TableInfo(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr, TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schemaPtr) : m_mutex(), m_master_client_ptr(master_client_ptr), m_identifier(identifier), m_schema(schemaPtr) {

00037 void TableInfo::dump_range_table() {
00038   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00039   for (RangeMapT::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); iter++) {
00040     cout << m_identifier.name << "[" << (*iter).second->start_row() << ".." << (*iter).second->end_row() << "]" << endl;
00041   }
00042 }

00047 bool TableInfo::get_range(RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00048   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00049   string end_row = range->end_row;
00050 
00051   RangeMapT::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00052 
00053   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00054     return false;
00055 
00056   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00057 
00058   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00059 
00060   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row))
00061     return false;
00062 
00063   return true;
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00070 bool TableInfo::remove_range(RangeSpec *range, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00071   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00072   string end_row = range->end_row;
00073 
00074   RangeMapT::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(end_row);
00075 
00076   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00077     return false;
00078 
00079   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00080 
00081   string start_row = range_ptr->start_row();
00082 
00083   if (strcmp(start_row.c_str(), range->start_row))
00084     return false;
00085 
00086   m_range_map.erase(iter);
00087 
00088   return true;
00089 }

00096 void TableInfo::add_range(RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00097   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00098   RangeMapT::iterator iter = m_range_map.find(range_ptr->end_row());
00099   assert(iter == m_range_map.end());
00100   m_range_map[range_ptr->end_row()] = range_ptr;
00101 }

00107 bool TableInfo::find_containing_range(std::string row, RangePtr &range_ptr) {
00108   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00109 
00110   RangeMapT::iterator iter = m_range_map.lower_bound(row);
00111 
00112   if (iter == m_range_map.end())
00113     return false;
00114 
00115   if (row <= (*iter).second->start_row())
00116     return false;
00117 
00118   range_ptr = (*iter).second;
00119 
00120   return true;
00121 }

00123 
00124 void TableInfo::get_range_vector(std::vector<RangePtr> &range_vec) {
00125   for (RangeMapT::iterator iter = m_range_map.begin(); iter != m_range_map.end(); iter++)
00126     range_vec.push_back((*iter).second);
00127 }

00130 void TableInfo::clear() {
00131   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00132   m_range_map.clear();
00133 }

00139 TableInfo *TableInfo::create_shallow_copy() {
00140   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00141   return new TableInfo(m_master_client_ptr, &m_identifier, m_schema);
